description:
After a certain mishap, the brilliant but socially inept engineer Apare Sorano and the shrewd but cowardly samurai Kosame Isshiki find themselves drifting on a boat from Japan to America. Broke, the two decide to compete in the Trans-America Wild Race to win the prize and return to Japan. The two battle crazy rivals, outlaws, and the great outdoors itself as they race through the wild West from the starting line in Los Angeles to the finish line in New York - in the steam-powered car they built.

(Source: Anime News Network)

The first two episodes pre-aired on select platforms starting from March 21st. Regular broadcast started on April 10.

tags.name: Historical
tags.description: Partly or completely set during a real period of world history.

tags.description: Partly or completely set in a country outside the country of origin.

tags.description: Prominently features technology and designs inspired by 19th-century industrial steam-powered machinery.

tags.description: Centers around character(s) moving between places a significant distance apart.

tags.description: Prominently features the use of guns in combat.

tags.name: Anachronism
tags.description: Prominently features elements that are out of place in the historical period the work takes place in, particularly modern elements in a historical setting.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Samurai
tags.description: Prominently features warriors of medieval Japanese nobility bound by a code of honor.

tags.name: Martial Arts
tags.description: Centers around the use of traditional hand-to-hand combat.

tags.name: Tanned Skin
tags.description: Prominently features characters with tanned skin.

node.description:
__Residency:__ Hino City, Tokyo, Japan
__Graduated:__ Berklee College of Music (Department of Film Scoring)

[Profile (Miracle Bus)](http://miraclebus.com/composer/evancall) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/evan.call.33) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/0nMGbTpPx4b3h5fMG9CpWJ) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/realevancall)
**Iida Satoki** is a Japanese freelance sound director.
Members: Waka Kirishima (霧島若歌), Fuuri Uebana (上花楓裏), Risuko Sasakama (ささかまリス子)

**Height:** 165cm 
**Favorite color:** Black
**Graduated:** Meiji University

**[Artist Profile (Add9th)](https://add9th.co.jp/profile/)** | **[Twitter](https://twitter.com/MorikuBorn)**

Shoutarou Morikubo is a Japanese voice actor who has been active in anime, drama CDs, and video games. He's the founder and representative director of [Add9th](https://add9th.co.jp/). He has additionally released song singles, a CD album, and a concert DVD. He was formerly affiliated with I'm Enterprise and VIMS.

In 2018, he formed the musical unit [buzz☆Vibes](https://anilist.co/staff/160730/buzzVibes) with Japanese multitalent [Shinnosuke](https://anilist.co/staff/160731/Shinnosuke).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/yuka_1106)

**Yuuka Sakurai** is a Japanese producer, animation planner and music producer working at Lantis. She is also director of music production at Bandai Namco Arts Inc. since April 1, 2018.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/horiken2000)

Founder and representative director of [P.A. Works](https://anilist.co/studio/132/).
